long_description: The women's Beach Hat from Sunday Afternoons keeps your skin shaded with built-in sun protection and a wide brim that also adds plenty of style to your ensemble. Now all you need is a stretch of sand. Soft polyester fabric is naturally lightweight and breathable; hat packs down for easy packing and travel. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Sunday Afternoons Beach Hat features a 4.5 in. brim.
short_description: The women's Beach Hat from Sunday Afternoons keeps your skin shaded with built-in sun protection and a wide brim that also adds plenty of style to your ensemble. Now all you need is a stretch of sand.
